District.getShops: SELECT shop_id, shops.name AS shop_name, description, district_id, streets.name AS street_name, streets.street_id FROM shops INNER JOIN streets ON shops.street_id = streets.street_id WHERE district_id = $1;
Shop.getProducts: SELECT shops.shop_id, shops.name AS shop_name, product_id, products.name AS product_name, products.description AS product_description, price FROM shops INNER JOIN products ON shops.shop_id = products.shop_id WHERE shops.shop_id = $1;
Shop.getRating: SELECT rating_id, shops.shop_id AS shop_id, name, user_id, point FROM ratings INNER JOIN shops ON ratings.shop_id = shops.shop_id WHERE shops.shop_id = $1;
Product.getInfo: SELECT product_id, name, description, price FROM products WHERE product_id = $1;
